title: Part One: Bill Cooper: The Man Who Killed Truth
itunes:title: Part One: Bill Cooper: The Man Who Killed Truth
description:
Robert is joined by Jamie Loftus to discuss conspiracy theorist Bill Cooper.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://www.wired.com/2017/03/internet-protocols-elders-zion/
  2. https://www.amazon.com/Culture-Conspiracy-Apocalyptic-Contemporary-Comparative/dp/0520248120
  3. https://www.amazon.com/Pale-Horse-Rider-William-Conspiracy/dp/0399169954
  4. https://books.google.com/books?id=_-oRyJF9t3cC&q=born#v=onepage&q&f=false
  5. https://medium.com/@lennyflatley/alex-jones-the-death-of-bill-cooper-and-the-rise-of-the-conspiracy-creeps-494d8646cf23
  6. https://newrepublic.com/article/150922/pioneer-paranoia
  7. https://www.iflscience.com/editors-blog/stricter-parents-turning-children-effective-liars/
  8. https://www.vulture.com/2018/08/how-behold-a-pale-horse-influenced-hip-hop.html
